title: Greek Chicken That We Can’t Stop Eating
subtitle: Sam the Cooking Guy
description: Juicy grilled chicken with a tangy Greek marinade, served with a creamy yogurt‑garlic sauce.
steps: Combine marinade ingredients (first 10 items) in a container and mix well.
Flatten chicken breasts, add to marinade (reserve 1/4), and refrigerate for at least 2 hours.
Bring to room temperature for 30 minutes before grilling.
Grill chicken over high heat, turning often and brushing with reserved marinade, until internal temp reaches 165 °F.
For the sauce, whisk together mayo, Greek yogurt, lemon juice, garlic paste, parsley, salt and pepper. Chill until serving.
notes: This recipe is a family favorite—serve with homemade naan or atop a Greek salad. Leftover marinade also makes a great sandwich sauce or bowl drizzle.
